Package org.apache.pivot.wtk

Class Form.Flag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pivot.wtk.Form.Flag
  • Enclosing class:
    Form
    public static class Form.Flag
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an message alert associated with a form field.
